function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Financial anxiety leading to homeowners avoiding selling their homes due to uncertainties caused by COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased housing market activity and transactions, leading to stagnation in the real estate market","Mitigation":"Provide financial reassurance and stability through government support or loan relief, as well as education on financial planning","Technologies":"Digital platforms for financial education and virtual tours for potential buyers","People":"Homeowners, potential sellers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, real estate agents"},{"Description":"Increased teleworking leading to potential homebuyers considering a new home if telework arrangements continue post-pandemic","Impact":"Potential surge in homebuying, changing housing demands, and increased mobility","Mitigation":"Offer flexible work arrangements, promote remote work-friendly policies, and invest in technology for remote collaboration and communication","Technologies":"Remote work tools, virtual meeting platforms, and cloud-based productivity software","People":"Teleworkers, potential homebuyers","Owner":"Employers, policymakers, technology companies"},{"Description":"Expectation of higher sale price leading to delay in selling homes","Impact":"Reduction in housing supply, high competition among buyers, and potential price inflation","Mitigation":"Provide accurate market information, create incentives for timely selling, and educate on the risks of waiting too long","Technologies":"Data analytics for real estate market trends and machine learning algorithms for price prediction","People":"Potential sellers, homebuyers","Owner":"Real estate agents, market analysts, government"}]}
